fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Starcaller's Watch__ 
Citlali's signature weapon, giving team-wide buffs.

__Thrilling Tales of The Dragon Slayer__ 
3-star weapon from wishing providing attack buffs to the next active character. 

If __Starcaller's Watch__ is not available, this will be almost always the best option.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Hakushin Ring, Prototype Amber, Mappa Mare__ 
Craftable options for those that somehow do not have Thrilling Tales of The Dragon Slayer

__Memory of Dust, Skyward Atlas, Favonius Codex, Oathsworn Eye__
Alternatives providing Energy to the team or ATK%.  

__Sacrificial Fragments__
The Elemental Mastery and Cooldown refresh make this another viable choice.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance
**2)** Elemental Burst: Lustrous Moonrise
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Black Pheasant Strides on Water
